entry.name: filled
entry.title: :filled Selector
entry.desc: Selects all elements with a filled value.
entry.longdesc:
filled means any value, but not only whitespace.
The implementation does a check like this: jQuery.trim(value).length > 0

example.desc: Finds input elements with a non-whitespace value.
example.html: Mouseover to see the value of each input
